string-array.name: updates
string-array.item: v2.6: add innosend.de, fix for android 2.0, remove ads for donators
v2.5.4: change notification icons, fix sending from contacts, remove ads for donator, fix failed send
v2.5.1: remove ads for donator, hint to solve captcha
v2.5: Split IO from app, detect o2 captcha
v2.4.3: Check userinput for default prefix
v2.4.2: Remove ads for donator, fix o2 captcha
v2.4.1: Remove ads for donator, minor changes to Sipgate and GUI
v2.3: Add Changelog, auto follow GMX hostchange, fix for 1.6
